gen:link.msg:message: `DebtSecurities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_DebtSecurities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_DebtSecurities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_ChildrenOfDebtSecuritiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_ChildrenOfDebtSecuritiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_ChildrenOfDebtSecuritiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E5_ChildrenOfDebtSecuritiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PayablesBanks` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_PayablesBanks')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_PayablesBanks return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfPayablesBanksCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfPayablesBanksCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfPayablesBanksDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPayablesGroupCompaniesAndShareholdersParticipatingInterestsBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfPayablesBanksDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
